aboveMaximumMessage: The input value must be less than or equal to ${max}.
belowMinimumMessage: The input value must be greater than or equal to ${min}.
invalidDoubleMessage: The input value must be a double.
invalidIntegerMessage: The input value must be an integer.
strictlyMaximumMessage: The input value must be less than ${max}.
strictlyMinimumMessage: The input value must be greater than ${min}.
